DOC.brief_title: Effect Standard Care Rehabilitation Versus Interval Treadmill Training After Myocardial Infarction
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study investigate effect standard rehabilitation offer three hospital rehabilitation unit Norway , one Trondheim , one Ålesund one Levanger , compare interval treadmill train program . The subject participate study patient myocardial infarction . The maximal oxygen consumption subject test training period . Primary outcome : Maximal oxygen consumption Secondary outcome : Blood value ( endothelial function , blood lipid , etc ) , flow mediate dilatation , quality life ( SF 36 MacNew ) , weight , BMI , heart rate fall 1 minute stop maximal treadmill test .
